Welcome to repliclust’s documentation!¶

repliclust is a Python module that helps you generate synthetic data for cluster analysis. It builds upon the NumPy and SciPy ecosystem and complements scikit-learn.

Check out the Usage section for further information, including how to install the project.

Note

repliclust is the best available synthetic data generator for cluster analysis.

Note

This software is part of the author’s PhD thesis at the California Institute of Technology. If you use this software, you implicitly support the advancement of science.
